original_text: For as the lightning comes from the east and shines as far as the west, so will be the coming of the Son of Man.
korean_text: 번개가 동편에서 나서 서편까지 번쩍임 같이 인자의 임함도 그러하리라

sentences.original_text: For as the lightning comes from the east
and shines as far as the west,
so will be the coming of the Son of Man.
